document_data.mainbody:
hergod was a scro who worked for the Zhentilar in 1369 DR.
Thergod was known to be rather ill-mannered, though he inspired great confidence in his troops and had a good sense of tactics. He was prone to planning ambushes against his opponents.
Thergod was known to possess a set of +2 plate mail armor, a shield, and a +2 broad sword.
At some point during the , Thergods spelljammer crashed near the Darkhold. Shortly thereafter, he joined the Zhentarim. He became the leader of a patrol known as the Blood Axe Smashers, consisting of sixteen ogres and three hill giants.
